lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into tonight's episode, we have some quick announcements to get through, beginning with our sponsors for this evening, Sam, if you would do the honors of our first sponsor tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Despite my advertising injury, the show must go on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Baldur's Gate Enhanced Edition, which includes Baldur's Gate One and Two and Siege of Dragonspear also launches on October 15th.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the bandage in his eye?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will always see this when I play Baldur's Gate now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following up with our second sponsor and sponsors with us since the beginning of Campaign Two, our friends at D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic guests, a very awesome time on that game, so I'm excited for you guys to check it out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too sexy. That trailer was too sexy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was going to shave my beard much earlier, but then I said, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did like that priest look, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was worth holding on to the facial hair for a little longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And today, if you haven't seen it yet, we shared a special, unannounced reward for our recent Kickstarter-- meaning unofficially announced as part of the Kickstarter, but we had talked about it, because Sam offered it up spontaneously-- for our Kickstarter campaign earlier this year for The Legend of Vox Machina and we took Travis through the Fear Gate haunted house in Simi Valley and filmed it for our and your pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once again, huge thanks to all of our fantastic Kickstarter supporters for allowing this crazy series to come together and for this man to be punished for all of our enjoyment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay, you don't need to see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good warning there, is during the break there will be scary clowns, so if you have a problem with some scary clowns, probably walk away for about ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough, good call on that, Taliesin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why couldn't I get that warning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at these pins, you guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the Mighty Nein crest as seen behind Matt Mercer was designed by Crystal Sharp, who is phenomenal, and you can check them out in our store right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We saw so many Critters in New York and they were rocking these pins, and we immediately grabbed them and smothered them with love.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am very excited about the chibi line, I'm very excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic, yeah. I'm really excited about jumping into tonight's episode of Critical Role!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (water bubbling) (thunder crashes) (explosion) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, Critical ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, dice, dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains, beware, 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, ♪ ♪ roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Ooh, ahh ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (fire whooshes)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Having collected one called the Laughing Hand, unintentionally with your aid, you began to hunt down the next venture after an attack on the Cobalt Soul's archive in Zadash, discovering the intent of Obann to raise another champion, apparently one known as the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Entering your abode, the Xhorhaus, you close the door behind, and exhale for what seems like the first time since your arrival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, we got very, very close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we got our asses handed to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, we thought we were badass and maybe we're not badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I was kind of thinking that people hate us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that might also be part of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess people, yeah, they don't like us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if we're not badass, we're just not very lucky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's not like we we set out to do any of this, right? We were thrust into this, and have been finding our way as we've been going, but the only real consistency is that we've been doing this together, but...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe it's time we trust someone else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've been managing our own problems and our own expectations, and just asking people to let us wander in and out of what they need with no real commitment, no humility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're saying we align with Obann and destroy the world?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you're going to do it, he's the person to do it with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got Yasha on his side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I always bet on the winner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not what I think what Caduceus or Caleb was talking about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Real allies, people that we've invested in, other than ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two separate nations, and whatever this goose chase is that we have been hunting down across the continent, for weeks, months, I can't keep up with Obann.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we need to invest in somebody and hope that they invest in what we see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find somebody that doesn't have that-- what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're talking about a third party? Someone outside of the Dynasty or the Empire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, the Cobalt Soul, who I thought was supposed to listen to me, they didn't offer any help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, to be fair, we kind of screwed with them just a little.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is fair, I think you don't even have to remind us of that, we have pissed off everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've still got holes in both of my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll get this dress cleaned eventually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To what we seem to be the only ones who are paying attention to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be honest, what's the worst that could happen? Either we die alone or we die as a part of something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should tell Essek and we have an enormous debt to pay, as he likes to remind us, but who would this third party be if we were going to find someone outside of the Empire, outside of the Dynasty?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than your mom, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That guy in Nicodranas, he has the big tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we gave the Happy Fun Ball to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were really good in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you were, and you were, both of you were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh that's right, we talked to him, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did the one thing we haven't done since, which is actually practice a little humility and honesty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that was the last time we did that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, maybe that's why he didn't hate us immediately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also gave him a shiny present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, no, I'm tracking all of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you lose your memory with your class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got dropped through those branches real fucking hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw one big branch smack you right upside the head and I wasn't going to say anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a last name and you just can't remember it? Is that what it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The question is which is the least risky?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And can we commit to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, this back and forth, this playing secrets--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The jet lag is really starting to catch up to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to report in with Essek? Or are we just going to jump to the wizard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should tell Essek at least about I mean, it's in their world now, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should at least--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell him that we fucked up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lay it at his feet and see what he does with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he shrugs us off after we say they got away--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And maybe he will surprise us, maybe--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if there's any fixing that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, he's got blood coming out of his ears! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His intelligence goes down to six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know that trust is going to be hard in here, but we've got to tell somebody something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we tell him now or do we tell him in the morning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we tell him in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually gives me a chance to check in and see what Dairon's been up to for the past three weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, two and a half, three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What news is there of your goings about?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can skip that, pretty much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe I have found traces that "the beacon that started this war was not "taken by the Empire, "but was indeed given by an agent within--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless they were looking for an excuse to start a war.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you get the impression this was recent or old?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This would have had to have happened "a year or more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was it? I wonder it's somebody we met! (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know it was! It was the old one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The old one, the goblin one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew it was her! I said, is she good or bad? I don't understand who's the good person, who's the bad person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, like if she took it from the Dynasty and gave it to the Empire, is that bad? Or did she do it because she's good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think it's bad, I think it's bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I am hoping that I have not lead a trace "back to this house."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you-- what? Why would you come back here if you thought you were being followed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't here. I was on another roof, "but I saw you enter and begin to call out."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go peek the windows, I'm going to start--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll head up to the rooftop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just pretend everything's normal? Should we just pretend like we're having a party or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to knock over a chair! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just dancing in the living room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ahhh, what do I see when I look out the window?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dancing in the living room, I imagine like in "Home Alone," where it's like two two mannequins that are just...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make a rooftop check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and perception for you as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you like a performance check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get that out of your system now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. (laughs) Much like the wonderful Lorde song "Liability," you stand there dancing with yourself in quiet desperation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the dad joke of dancing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a three, I have to pop and lock!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a poop and a look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm seeing a Molly Ringwald Breakfast Club kind of dance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For a three, that's too good for a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping an eye out for a quiet ten or minutes among the streets, you can see there are wandering guards of Rosohna doing their usual path, but you do not see any strange foot traffic or anything moving in your direction that would spike your alarm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have a cellar? We've got a dung- right? We got a basement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we all could use--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go set that up right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I summon the Star Razor in my hand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use one of its abilities, See Invisibility?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have an ability to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you feel a little more confident and a little more assured that at least there is no unseen peering near you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: one hour, shit, okay, so I'll just walk around the inside of the house as well, and make sure no one snuck in after Dairon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to just do a patrol for a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting a really nice hot tub time coming up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big fuck-off sword at my side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will tell Frumpkin to mirror Beau a few-- are you outside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will sit in the tree, and slowly walk around the tree and look for anybody fucking with the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can see a lot from that tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything else, Dairon, that we should know? Any details of where or how you learned this information? Where did you learn this information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had to masquerade as a few different individuals "to make my way into some of these avenues."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But this is the job that we are trained for."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Someone is covering a trail of this."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So I think I may be heading back "to the Cobalt Soul myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: if they could lift the ban on us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you could, like, do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What-- I'm not even going to ask."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can do that, you can get the bans lifted probably, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would do that after you've given them the good news of all the information that you have here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see what I can do, as I know you are prone to "very curious means of reaching the ends of your quest."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will inform of your particular advancement, "as I have been intending to and that should help."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would it be too much to ask how or who you were speaking with or overheard discussing this information with?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just so we can rule them out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, from whom did you learn that this transpired? Or was it just in research and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was in research. This was in getting-- "bypassing the various guardians of the interior "chamber, note-taking, and record-keeping." At this point in time, you in particular, Travis, glancing up to the top of the stairs, just from watching about, there's this faint little glowing orb that's been coasting along the ceiling, gently floats down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have headed up there anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, lets, I dance up the stairs. Let's do it. It's a party after all, here, in this house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, we'll start heading up the stairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it at the top of the the first landing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just very slowly moving in the direction of where you all are, seemingly following the sound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Once we get to a level that is closer to it in distance, I'll reach out and I'll fire two Eldritch Blasts at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll two attack rolls for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know those videos of people shooting drones out of the sky?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Love the ren faire one where someone hits it with, they throw a lance--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it'd be smart to just pretend just boring in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the back portion of the wall behind it has two holes now blown into it from the force damage of the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I saw that spider up there, too! Don't worry, I think you got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe on the double if you could join me on the roof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we were going to the roof anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's changed direction and is now heading towards slowly the path you guys are taking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, I'm so nerv-- I'm like running! Come on, come on, fucking follow me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we running from? What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just running, running! Up on the roof!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come behind me, come behind me, come behind me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we come up the stairs, do we see it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like a scrying ball?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a glowing sphere, but I tried to shoot it and it went right through it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet it's spying on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know from the times you've been scrying that the projection of your consciousness does appear as an invisible beacon, essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, if it's going to follow us, let's all pretend like we're having a party up here it'll be so confused!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not just a party, let's talk about our (louder) upcoming trip to Rexxentrum!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or somewhere else that you guys want to visit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) It was coming up the stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before you dispel it, we can do things with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk over to the edge of the stairs, you guys are all in the little garden around the tree right now, is that where you guys have gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start making dinner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give it false information first. Don't dispel it yet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you're just shaking a cocktail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go to Rexxentrum all right. Right, Caleb? To Rexxentrum!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we will find that beacon, just...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that device of great machination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or one of you can make it with advantage, since you're doing this together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both of you should do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you feel confident that to some folks you may have been believable in your strange display of boisterous planning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish your statement, you look over and there's Caleb standing at the front and you see the orb slowly begin to rise up to the top of the stairs, and when it gets within a foot of Caleb, Caleb holds up a necklace and you watch (whoosh) blink out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't see it. What are you holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so people can't find him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, you have-- you said! People cannot look in on you from afar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's coming back from his amnesia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cure Wounds at level one on Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't tell who, though, right? That's not how scrying works. You can't tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could scry on somebody and see-- oh no, I can't scry on anybody, I'm out of power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that something your god could tell us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think there is an above average chance that it's someone here who knows that we've returned?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Traveler! Did you see who was looking at us? Traveler, did you see that funny ball?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't you need to be alone for that, Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could find out something about them if we really wanted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could Commune, see if just some general idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sleeping? You went to bed or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we knew when we got this house that we were probably being watched the whole time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do we want to bet on? Who do we think it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I wonder how many times they've done that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I hope we weren't saying anything stupid when they did that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Us? No! Tight lipped, not a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When you spend all your time trying to parse what information to put out, you're always going to be a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder who they were scrying on specifically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to target an individual?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to target somebody, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like to think it was me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it could have been our house in general.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It did seem like it was following us, and if Caleb is able to prevent that then that rules him out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we need to assume, though, that it has heard Yussa's name, whoever was looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also know, from your experience with Scry, that it only really picks up information in the vicinity--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the immediate vicinity of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you were looking for it, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It appeared later. I think we're safe with Yussa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's when you used the ability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but he'd been using it for like an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so it wasn't with us for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so let's pretend someone was watching, we should--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that change anything? Are we still going to report to Essek in the morning?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you able to do your suggestion, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would ask what three questions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You would ask, is it from someone here? If that is yes, we start naming names.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, what are our two names?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look it up in my memory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give me a piece of paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet I can find it faster!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the meantime, I need some tea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Skysybil Abrianna, the female goblin, Den Mirimm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So Essek and the Bright Queen are immediate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, I'm proud of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Essek, Skysybil, Bright Queen? So, is it someone in the Dynasty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we ever look him up again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knew what we were and we talked him out of believing it, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if he hates us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start burning a little incense, drinking my tea incense and getting together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though the sun doesn't necessarily rise or fall here in the center of Rosohna, it is about dawn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pretty tired, just as a heads up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, this is good to do now before we crash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the end of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After the incense burns and you inhale it into your nose and it tingles and sears the inside, your eyes water slightly, and with your eyes closed you can feel that warm breeze pass through your mind and over your arms and shoulders as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it by someone who is a member of the Dynasty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! You guys are so in sync.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually watch as both Caduceus' and Fjord's hair slightly shift to an invisible wind that doesn't exist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Essek part of Den Thelyss?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did we already ask-- was it the Dynasty?

lines.text: True, but they might not suck mortal death because they're not guarding the heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, just pointing it out, not trying to throw another thing to think about, but in my investigation check, the Arcane Armory and the study were both heavily poured over. Do we feel like there's any need to go to there, or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably because they lead to a lot of other things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So let's go there and maybe we call--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, how would we even get to the Tapestry Entrance? We're at the Diamond Entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, too, the Tapestry Entrance, you guys checked not all but I think three of the tapestries one of which was the exit, one of which electrocuted a bunch of you, and another one that seemed to have, if I recall, I have to look it up, but another form of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it goes bing, boom, boom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a tapestry you haven't checked out.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: I feel like the garden is--

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the difference between these two doors?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One is gold, one is silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fucking do it! Let's do it, let's be proactive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm in touch with nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you impressed or judging me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you step to the precipice of the golden archway. Who steps through first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you need to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what you roll high on, really, acrobatics?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get down with that nature, yo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus comes in ass over tea kettle, (scraping sound) skidding into the dirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do suffer four points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.text: Do I have to make a Concentration check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, four points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, thankfully I have advantage, so yeah, that's 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With thick, vine-covered tropical trees stretching up multiple stories towards a sourceless, unchanging sunset.

lines.text: It should be a room, but it feels like a jungle.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: You can see past the trees to the front and left of where you landed what looks to be a massive mountainside cliff of rock that rises up past visual sight and you can hear the faint sound of rushing water, like a waterfall just out of sight.

lines.text: What if all this is just a big illusion or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go touch some-- go draw a dick on a tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we shouldn't touch anything.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look around, you begin to see now these soft little motes of dancing light, faintly orange like little fireflies that just glide through the air around you.

lines.text: Does this look recognizable to anything I might have studied?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The motes aren't connected to anything, they're free floating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just freely float, but around the presence of magical spellcraft or incantations or any sort of strong magical presence, they gravitate towards it to eat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) (gasps) No wonder, if Allura had been here, they would have all come to her and tried to devour her.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd just be careful, maybe not--

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing appears to be shifting or moving out of the ordinary. It appears to be just standing in the middle of a natural space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to find entrances, something that will lead us to another--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to go to the mountains or to the water?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll head down towards the water.

lines.text: Can I have a marching order, please? (gasps and oohs)

lines.text: Do we want the nature boys to walk up front?

lines.text: I'll keep-- we can have perception in the front or perception in the back, if you want.

lines.text: All righty, and then? Caleb after that.

lines.text: Maybe you and Fjord should go?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: That would be a 20 to hit.

lines.text: I'm going to trust that you'll get us out of here.

lines.text: You can't move, your speed is zero--

lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack roll with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11 and a 12, both plus, this is the crossbow, right, so plus 10, so 21.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: This is going to rush around, 10, 15, 20 to Caleb there, oh god, the trees, the trees keep falling.

lines.text: That is going to be a 21.

lines.text: Both hit? Oh wow, even with the--

lines.text: 40 minutes, that's how long? After a half hour, I would go (snap).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The large stained glass window that contained an imprint of various planes connected, shelves and the desk, almost no light but what little bit of light there is in there it looks like things have been tousled a bit, like the chair of the desk has been knocked over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While resting, I ask Frumpkin: Did you see a vanity that looks like it had been hacked to pieces? Because that's where we were attacked, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guts of that, and I ask Frumpkin if he saw the book that was so tempting to me before we dove in after Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bars are open and the shelves are clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the innards of the the cabinet mimic that you had battled still remained on the floor where it was left previously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it looks like, best Frumpkin could tell, it's been rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To whatever extent, whatever came through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, as we sit here resting, it occurs to me as we sit around here that Miss Elaina out there has been waiting for days for us to return now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should send her a message.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should definitely send her a message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I send her a message, or should I use this amazing mirror that she gave me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Communication lasts for up to 10 minutes, I can use it three times a whole day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably maintain contact when we go through so we can describe what we see, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so cast it, talk to her, go through the thing and keep talking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you get two birds, one stone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we ready to go through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, no, Caduceus, Fjord, and Caleb are still on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rope is down, we're on a short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I'm just saying, that's where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you guys doing down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Into the Machine, is that the conversation we're all having, not the Crystal Cave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will admit I'm a little disappointed, but I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a cave made of crystal. That can't hurt you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You remember when we saw a cave of crystals before and they were so beautiful?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love to see something like that again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything in the information that we gleaned from the libraries that would indicate that a crystal cave is useful to us, a connection to another plane of existence?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, she's been there for a week, I bet she's done a lot of research in the time that we've been gone, so maybe she'll know more about each of the rooms!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's start it, we'll get up here, we'll start it and then we'll tell her where we're going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is quicker to get down than get up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, I also used Arcane Recovery on that short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you got your spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to do it, okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull up the mirror.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Talk to a Jester quite so fair! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The reflection of your face goes cloudy for a moment and swirls and then begins to reform into the face of Allura Vysoren.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been nearly three days on this end."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have done a bit of research on this "Angel of Irons you've been speaking about." "Not a whole lot to find here, though I do think "I may have a divination spell that might "hopefully pierce any sort of guise or "veil of secrecy that it's keeping, "but I will require you to be here "and if you have any effects of a member of the cult at all, "that might be helpful in gleaning information."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, how goes it there? Please tell me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so we're in the Garden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We fought a giant frog thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's only been a couple hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what do you think is more dangerous? A golem place or the dreadnought?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is there anything else you can give me to help with this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell her, on the map, the Tower Machine looks like it has gears and some sort of machinery and the Crystal Mine, the art does look a bit like a toothy maw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it kind of does, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could just be artistic expression, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The eye sees what it wants to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Allura, did you find anything while sitting there for three days that would indicate anything about these Crystal Mines? Any further research?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know if you've recently come upon anyone "or any creatures of golem construction."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, that was that last time, I forgot about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before your time, Caduceus, we were visiting a town called Hupperdook and we tangled with a bit of clockwork.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking of the magic cabinet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there is a Golem Workshop, there's probably "golems somewhere, maybe not just in the workshop, "so be on the lookout."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet they'll be in the Tower Machine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can begin to research "if you'd like. It might take a little bit of time."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, we'll call you in 10 minutes, which will be two days later for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Judging by the time passage there, "you said it had been two to three hours? "Looks to be about an hour per day transition, "so keep that in mind."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So far." "Who knows if all the chambers are consistent."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we go into the Tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That way, at least, we'll have a path forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe it's an important room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe there's some cool weapons and protections there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should do the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The faceless and reminiscent of the creature or shape you saw embedded in the ceiling of the chamber you arrived in, now emblazoned with runes and where one of its hands is you can see some sort of a claw, an open, C-like claw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, if you hang out in the room too long, the golems come after you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or it follows you from room to room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look down at it, you see its face (whirs) look up and there's just a single glowing sigil where its face would be that seems focused on all of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around behind you, you can see--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I flip the mirror around so Allura can see everything that we're seeing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll leave for next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it, I love it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got golems, we got Allura, we got a dungeon crawl, we got a map.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to find those two doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (like Kermit the Frog) ♪ Why are there are so many ♪ ♪ Songs about Halas ♪ ♪ And what's on other side ♪

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We killed Kermit in this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is just a portion of a tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in the engine of the Happy Fun Ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is as much as Yussa has mapped out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you previously heard and Allura confirmed, 100 or more chambers within the Folding Halls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up there next week and see where this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night! (dramatic orchestral music)
